# Create `shields.io` Badge

1. simplify `.svg` file (high complexity can lead to rendering errors)
2. convert image to `base64`, using e.g. https://base64.guru/converter/encode/image
3. use above markdown badges to adapt URL (compare [`shields.io` documentation](https://shields.io/))
